summary: A woman discovers the newly resurrected, partially formed, body of her brother-in-law. She starts killing for him to revitalize his body so he can escape the demonic beings that are pursuing him after he escaped their sadistic underworld.
cast: Andrew Robinson|Clare Higgins|Ashley Laurence|Sean Chapman|Oliver Smith|Robert Hines|Anthony Allen|Leon Davis|Michael Cassidy|Frank Baker|Kenneth Nelson|Gay Baynes|Niall Buggy|Dave Atkins|Oliver Parker|Pamela Sholto|Doug Bradley|Nicholas Vince|Simon Bamford|Grace Kirby|Sharon Bower|Raul Newney
title: Hellraiser: Los que traen el infierno
